pinyin: shèng bài nǎi bīng jiā cháng shì
meaning: Victory and defeat are common in war / Winning and losing is part of the game
description: War has wins and losses. It means that winning or losing is a common occurrence and one should not be discouraged by defeat or arrogant in victory.

examples.chinese: 胜败乃兵家常事,对待输赢请平常心
examples.translation: Winning and losing is common, please keep a calm mind.

examples.chinese: 胜败乃兵家常事,下次比赛加油就是了
examples.translation: Failure is common, just try harder in the next game.

examples.chinese: 竞技体育没有常胜将军,胜败乃兵家常事啊
examples.translation: There is no ever-victorious general in sports, winning and losing is part of the game.
